pageContext.claim: “And remember during the debates, during the debates, I was the only one -- I said, we will protect your Social Security.”
pageContext.analysis: Almost every candidate pledges to protect Social Security. Trump at a Republican primary debate said, "It's my absolute intention to leave Social Security the way it is. Not increase the age and to leave it as is." Other Republicans would have raised the retirement age, but Hillary Clinton was against raising it.
